class.name: uav_detect/PCLDetector
class.description: Nodelet for detecting a flying object in a pointcloud

class.name: uav_detect/PCLSelfLocalizator
class.description: Nodelet for self-localization in apriori known pointcloud map using a LiDAR sensor

class.name: uav_detect/MaskCreator
class.description: Nodelet for automatic creation of masks from pointcloud messages
